typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [UID]\n      ,[SLI_ID]\n      ,[Ops_Report_ID]\n      ,[Metric_Group]\n      ,[Metric_Sub_Group]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Questions]',
	format: 'query') ~> OpsQuestions
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Asset_Name]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> Asset
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns, SelectQuestionKey lookup(UID == Question_UID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpOpsQuestionUID
OpsQuestions select(mapColumn(
		Question_UID = UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectQuestionKey
Asset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Asset_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAssetKey
LkpAsset derive(Validation_Error = iif(isNull(Question_UID)||isNull(Asset_Asset_ID)||isNull(toDate(Reporting_Period,'dd/MM/yyyy'))||isNull(toInteger(Answer_Number)),'Error in UID / Fund / Asset / Reporting Date / Answer Number',toString(null()))) ~> DerivedValidationError
LkpOpsQuestionUID, SelectAssetKey lookup(Asset_ID == Asset_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Asset_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpAsset
DerivedValidationError sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Audit_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code as string,
		Corrective_Action_Identified as string,
		Audit_Date as string,
		Audit_Classification as string,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date as string,
		Date_Action_Closed as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Audit_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalAuditType
ValidatedDateAndNumber@ValidDateAndNumber, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidAuditType@ValidAuditType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndNumber split(not(isNull(Derived_Audit_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Audit_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Audit_ID)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Corrective_Action_Due_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Corrective_Action_Due_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Date_Action_Closed)),not(isNull(Derived_Date_Action_Closed)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDateAndNumber@(ValidDateAndNumber, InvalidDateOrNumber)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Audit_ID = toInteger(Audit_ID),
		Derived_Audit_Date = toDate(Audit_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Corrective_Action_Due_Date = toDate(Corrective_Action_Due_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Date_Action_Closed = toDate(Date_Action_Closed,"dd/MM/yyyy")) ~> ConvertDateAndNumber
InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrNumber
ValidatedDateAndNumber@InvalidDateOrNumber derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Audit ID / Other dates fileds in source file")) ~> InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrNumber, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidAuditType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalIncidentType lookup(Certification_Audit_Type_Code == Relation_Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalAuditType
RelationalAuditType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Certification_Audit_Type_Code = Certification_Audit_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalIncidentType
LookupRelationalAuditType split(not(isNull(Relation_Certification_Audit_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidAuditType@(ValidAuditType, InvalidAuditType)
IsValidAuditType@InvalidAuditType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Certification Audit Type Code")) ~> InvalidAuditTypeErrormessage
InvalidAuditTypeErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidAuditType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Audit_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code as string,
		Corrective_Action_Identified as string,
		Audit_Date as string,
		Audit_Classification as string,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date as string,
		Date_Action_Closed as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,

		{Certifying_Body } as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Minor_CARs as string,
		Major_Cars as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',

source(output(
		Certification_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Certification_Type_Code]\nFROM [relational].[OPS_Certification_Type]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalCertificationType
ValidatedCertificationDandDate@ValidDateAndCertificationID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidCertificationType@ValidCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date = {Next Audit_Date},
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Minor_CARs,
		Major_Cars
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndCertificationID split(not(isNull(Derived_Certification_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && iif(not(isNull({Next Audit_Date})),not(isNull(Derived_Next_Audit_Date)),true()) && iif(not(isNull(Certification_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Certification_Date)),true()) && iif(not(isNull(Certification_End_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Certification_End_Date)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedCertificationDandDate@(ValidDateAndCertificationID, InvalidDateOrCertificationID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Next_Audit_Date = toDate({Next Audit_Date},"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Certification_Id = toInteger(Certification_ID),
		Derived_Certification_Date = toDate(Certification_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Certification_End_Date = toDate(Certification_End_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy")) ~> ConvertDateAndCertificationID
InvalidDateOrCertificationIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date = {Next Audit_Date},
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error,
		Minor_CARs,
		Major_Cars
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrCertificationID
ValidatedCertificationDandDate@InvalidDateOrCertificationID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Certificatiation Date / Certification End Date/ Next Audit Date / Certification ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrCertificationIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date = {Next Audit_Date},
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error,
		Minor_CARs,
		Major_Cars
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrCertificationID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidCertificationType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalCertificationType lookup(Certification_Type_Code == Relation_Certification_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalIncidentType
RelationalCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalCertificationType
LookupRelationalIncidentType split(not(isNull(Relation_Certification_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidCertificationType@(ValidCertificationType, InvalidCertificationType)
IsValidCertificationType@InvalidCertificationType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Certification Type Code")) ~> InvalidCertificationTypeerrormessage
InvalidCertificationTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date = {Next Audit_Date},
		{Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error,
		Minor_CARs,
		Major_Cars
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidCertificationType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Minor_CARS as string,
		Major_CARS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body = {Certifying_Body },
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Validation_Error,
		Minor_CARS = Minor_CARs,
		Major_CARS = Major_Cars
	)) ~> StagingDB

		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,

		Termination_Date as string,

		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,

	),

	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedDateAndNumber@ValidDateAndNumber, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,

		Fund_ID,

		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndNumbers split(not(isNull(Derived_Contract_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Execution_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Termination_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Contract_Value)),not(isNull(Derived_Contract_Value)),true()),

		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,

		Contract_Value,

RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage

		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

		Contract_ID as string,

		Termination_Date as string,

		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Contract_Type as string
	),
